guardian.title: What is this dog thinking? Scientists now have some fascinating answers
guardian.topComment: I'm pretty sure my dog thinks I'm stupid for going to work 5 days a week instead of staying home to go for walks with him

guardian.title: Lance Armstrong fined $10m for drugs lies in SCA Promotions case
Ukraine ceasefire in tatters as clashes escalate in east
guardian.topComment: Mr Putin.....please control your lap dog Zakharchenko! No you can't have, Debaltseve, Mariupol or Kramatorsk. People in Ukraine want to live in peace and not join your puppet, banana republics!
